channel.title: How to get a key through giveaway
channel.description: I just found out about the game now, and I don't want to wait all the way to march 31st to play it. Is there any possible way I can get a key anytime soon? Thank you!

No begging for keys - bring it to private messages guys.

item.title: How to get a key through giveaway
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description:
You can get the keys from some people who bought lots of keys.
The kickstarter closed and for steam, you can’t buy it until the initial release, which is Summer.

Read full topic

The only way you can get Alpha keys now is to enter a giveaway OR spend money.
